A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Like many others. I have many mixed feelings about Star Wars TLJ.

Overall it was great and easily worth the watch\, but it's really a shame\, because this movie could have been about a million times better.

The story at times felt like it was written by a 5 year old\, there were so many plot holes and points where the story again could of been just simply better.

Negatives aside\, I've given this a 4 1/2 rating because of how well this movie performed otherwise. The visuals... oh my god. Truly beautiful. Also I love the world of star wars and watching this movie in 4D was a huge immersive bonus for me.

The acting\, especially from Mark Hamill was spectacular\, he really managed to bring Luke Skywalker back after all these years and it felt truly immersive.
